page.title: 09MR.BREWER 1
page.content: Mr. Brewer lives at Trenance and is an 87 year old widower.He gets up at 7.30 a.m. and has oatmeal and toast for breakfast.Then he washes up the dishes and listens for the 8 a.m news on Radio Cornwall.Then at about 9.30 a.m. he walks down to Trenance Shop in Mawgan Porth.Later on Mr.Brewer does a bit of gardening;this includes vegetables as well as flowers.At 11 a.m. or later Mr.Brewer has a cup of coffee or tea.After his elevenses,he sits down to have a rest until at 12.15 he prepares his sandwiches for dinner at 12.30.After his meal Mr.Brewer then switches on to Radio Cornwall again to listen to the news.Although he does some gardening Mr.Brewer doesn't have any hobbies.He sometimes goes up to the old farm,a short distance away for a cup of coffee with Mrs.Berlace who's a widow.
